title: [Suggestion] When friends are sorted alphabetically, group online and offline friends (if shown)
body: One thing I've noticed is that if you have offline friends shown and you sort alphabetically, the online friends are scattered all over the place. Isn't it best just to show the online friends alphabetically and then the offline friends?

replies.body: Yeah, I agree with that. Offline friends should also be a bit easier to differentiate to everyone else. Currently they maintain the same colors, with only the tiny dot showing that they are offline.
